p: Animals were assigned into four groups containing four animals in each group, a group I as control: treated with placebo carbopol hydrogel (without Moringa oleifera extract); group II as standard: 5% povidone treated; group III as 5% M. oleifera extract: 5% hydrogel of hexane seeds extract of M. oleifera; group IV as 10% M. oleifera extract: 10% hydrogel of hexane seeds extract of M. oleifera.
